    • Constructor Detail

      • Market

        public Market​(UserRepository userRepository,
              ArtManager artManager,
              WalletManager walletLibrary)
        A different Market instance is created for every type of merchandise available for trade. Currently, merchandises are Art and Wallet objects. This class facilitates trading by presenting necessary information to the controllers and make calls to TradingUtil objects that actually make the trade Stored in MARKETCONTROLLER (which is initialized exactly ONCE in FRONTCONTROLLER)
        Parameters:
        userRepository - an UserRepository
        artManager - an ArtManager
        walletLibrary - a WalletManager

    • Method Detail

      • checkItem

        public boolean checkItem​(Merchandise merchandise)
        checks if this merchandise is still for sale
        Parameters:
        merchandise - the merchandise being checked
        Returns:
        a bool of whether this item is for sale

      • getItemsForSale

        public java.util.List<Merchandise> getItemsForSale()
        gets the list of all the merchandise that's for sale
        Returns:
        a List of Merchandise objects

      • getNamesMerchandiseForSale

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNamesMerchandiseForSale()
        Returns:
        a List of name of Merchandise listed on the market

      • addArtToMarket

        public boolean addArtToMarket​(java.util.UUID id)
        Adds a piece of art to the market
        Parameters:
        id - the UUID of the art piece
        Returns:
        a boolean on whether the operation is successful, true if the art isn't already on the market

      • makeTradeWithCash

        public void makeTradeWithCash​(java.util.UUID artId,
                              java.util.UUID paymentWalletId)
        Makes a trade with cash currency
        Parameters:
        artId - the UUId of the art being bought
        paymentWalletId - the UUID of the wallet used to pay

      • makeTradeWithArt

        public void makeTradeWithArt​(java.util.UUID wantedArtId,
                             java.util.UUID userArtId)
        Makes a trade with another piece of art
        Parameters:
        wantedArtId - the UUID of the wanted art
        userArtId - the UUID of the art being used as payment
